title: custom password
extract: Custom password policies. ... Custom password policies are created and applied through a Security Policy Settings document. Through a custom password policy, administrators can restrict or prohibit the use of the following in user passwords: user name as part of the password. repeating characters.
extract_html: Custom password policies. ... Custom password policies are created and applied through a Security Policy Settings document. Through a custom password policy, administrators can restrict or prohibit the use of the following in user passwords: user name as part of the password. repeating characters.
